case.state: Ah! What kind of place is this? Why are you naked?
W-why are you naked ~player~?!
Wait, is this some kind of topless bar?!
Hi, I'm Lucy! I came because of the job request that was posted at the Fairy Tail guild.
Wait, this is just a regular poker game, right? Why does it matter if there are guys here?
Oh, Gray! Thanks for coming, it'll be good to have a friend here!
A butterfly is playing?!
Uh, is there a reason you only picked Fairy Tail members to play with?
I know the job request you posted asked for Cana Alberona because of her card skills but she was too, er...hungover to come, so here I am.
Hey, stop laughing about my skirt falling down!
Can I get ~cards~ cards?
Could you pass me ~cards~ cards, please?
This hand makes me wish we were playing for jewels. I could use the rent money.
Nothing to worry about with this hand!
The job posting said I get double the reward if I win! I can't wait to collect those jewels!
My friends are my power! When I put my faith in them, I'm unbeatable.
Looks like Fairy Tail is about to take an early lead!
You perverts aren't getting me out of my clothes this round!
Yes! For once I might make it out of a job without losing my clothes!
On the bright side, at least you won't be seeing any more of my panties this round.
I really wish I had this hand back before I lost my belt. I feel defenseless without my keys and whip.
You're not seeing my panties this round...well, not again anyways!
Oh, thank goodness! I've modeled in my underwear before, but going topless would have been too much!
You can stop staring at my chest, because I'm not losing this round!
Where was this hand before I had to show everyone my panties?
I may be humiliated, but a Fairy Tail wizard never accepts defeat!
S-stop staring at me! I'm not stripping this time!
I may be exposed, but at least this hand will keep things from getting even worse!
I forgot about my hair ties! Can I trade them for something I already took off?
I felt better about middle of the road hands when I was fully dressed.
Well, this hand could go either way, but I'll choose to have faith that I'll win!
You know when I was a little girl dreaming of joining a wizard guild, I never expected it would involve strip poker.
I've read some books featuring poker games, but it's certainly different actually playing one.
It may not be the best hand, but I can still win with this!
The first master of the Fairy Tail guild, Mavis Vermillion, was a master tactician. She'd know just what to do with a hand like this.
It's not a perfect hand, but a Fairy Tail wizard never gives up.
I can't tell whether this is a winning hand, so I'll just have faith.
Waiting to find out if this hand is good compared to everyone else's makes this even more nerve wracking.
If I'm representing the number one guild in Fiore, how come I never get the number one hand?
Well, a mediocre hand is better than a bad one at least.
These cards may be mediocre but I won't lose hope because Fairy Tail never gives up!
The last time I was naked on a job, a dragon stripped me and tried to eat me...so I guess this is better.
Hey! Stop looking at my cards...and my, um, you know...
I could really use a miracle from the power of friendship to save what little pride I have left right now.
Well...I guess losing won't be so bad since you already saw my panties once.
Um...you already saw my panties once so you don't need to look anymore when I lose this round!
Ugh, looks like you're about to catch me with my pants...er, skirt, down.
Why do I always get stuck with these kinds of jobs?
Well, so much for playing a perfect game.
I thought beginner's luck was supposed to be a thing in poker. Guess I was wrong.
The only thing that annoys me more than these cards is Natsu and Happy breaking into my apartment.
Well...at least I still have some minor things left to take off.
So, uh...any chance someone wants to do me a favor and lose this hand? Please?
I'm gonna have to strip AGAIN?!
Well these cards aren't going to help me shed my unwanted reputation as "Fairy Tail's resident streaker".
When I get back to the guild hall, I'm going to make Mira stop serving Cana alcohol for a week!
Not that I'm worried, but if I lose I won't have to streak home, will I?
At this point, I've just accepted that my luck is terrible.
And just like that this day goes from bad to worse.
I don't even want to think about what Erza will do when she finds out I shamed the guild like this.
No, no, no! I can't afford to lose again!
Why am I the one who always ends up naked on guild jobs?
So, uh, any stripping that happens here stays between us, right?
Weekly Sorcerer Magazine offered me a chance to do a nude shoot once for a lot of jewels, but I turned it down. Now I have to do it for free.
Oh well, I did try to stab her actually, but we made up after we found out it was all a big misunderstanding.
I've got a spirit that can split skulls with his axe...but Taurus is a giant pervert so this isn't really the best time.
Well, we did get punished for taking an S-class mission without permission once. Of course, the Master just spanked me once so I got off easy.
The Magic Council has been telling Fairy Tail that for over 100 years, but it seems like our guild brawls just make us closer as a family.
H-hey! I may have worked as a dancer at a sleazy bar once, but that was for an undercover job!
D-don't try that on me too, please! Brandish from the Spriggan 12 did that to me once already!
You'd like my friend Erza. She has an obsession with strawberry cake.
I-I've never done that! Actually...my lack of experience with boys is a running joke at the guild.
Happy birthday!
Sorry, but it looks like you'll be spending your birthday in your birthday suit, Meia!
My spirit Lyra is a wonderful singer, but I can only summon her three times a month.
Ewww...
I've been re-reading the works of Kemu Zaleon, my favorite author! His work inspired me to become an author myself!
My dream as a little girl was to join the Fairy Tail wizard guild and become a published author, and I've actually done both!
I'm always struggling for cash, thanks to all the collateral damage my team ends up paying for so I'd be happy to accept a drink!
Um, well, I haven't really done anything like that before, Sei. I don't have much experience with love.
Um, well, I may have read a romance novel that featured it once.
Wow, that was a really poor time for a run of bad luck, Meia.
We should just count our blessings that there aren't any men here to ogle us.
Oh, you get roped into coming here by a friend too, eh Meia?
If you want a real challenge, you should race my guildmate Jet. His magic gives him speed!
Hmm, I can't believe I'm saying this, but okay! I'll take your bet, D.Va!
I'd leave with you, Natsuki, but giving up on a job I took would drag Fairy Tail's reputation through the mud.
Well, the former king of my country likes to dress up as a pumpkin. It's a long story.
If you like flowers, you should visit my home of Fiore, Jura. All of our towns are named after flowers. I live in Magnolia.
Bring it on, Meia! I'm a Fairy Tail wizard and I will protect my guild's pride!
I might actually win this!
I may be behind but I'm still in the game, so don't get too cocky!
Aww, Natsuki is adorable when she gets insecure about her chest size.
Do girls actually fall for that line?
Um, well...sometimes I think about my mom. She passed away when I was young, and I hope that she would have been proud of me.
Um, I don't really run a deck normally, but even I know not to give your opponent free advice!
Wait! Did a blue cat tell you what I did at the Christmas party last year! Darn it Happy, why can you never keep a secret?!
Well, one of my friends is lost somewhere in the world and I promised to find her, so I'd like to go to wherever she is.
I definitely prefer the heat! My very first mission as a Fairy Tail member I had to go up a freezing mountain, and it was terrible.
I'm an okay cook, but my guildmate Mirajane is much better than me!
Well to be honest, I didn't learn to cook until after I ran away from home. When I was younger, the servants cooked my meals.
You mean like the King's Game? Last time I played that, I got hot wax dripped all over my back, so no thank you!
One of my celestial spirits, Lyra, is an amazing singer!
Our money is called jewels, and I never have enough of them!
Well, I was an only child so things were pretty lonely for me growing up...wait, did you say all your sisters are named Anna too?
Well, I did dress up as a bunny to promote a restaurant opening once. The owner is a good friend of Fairy Tail's master and a former Magic Council member.
Do you want to go shopping after this, Anna? I could use someone with your bargaining skills to help negotiate prices!
I would probably use it to help with rent.
Sounds like you've got a bad hand, Natsuki. Would you mind taking one for the team and losing this round? I don't want to strip again!
Well this Earthland girl is definitely embarrassed when she's nude.
It's too bad you don't like bars, Meia. I would have invited you back to the guild for a drink.
Two of my close friends have blue hair actually, so it's not totally unique in Earthland.
My home in the Kingdom of Fiore has a queen. She's actually a good friend.
My guildmates and I go on adventures around the world. Right now, we're tracking down the five dragon gods on a 100 Year Quest.
I like to mix and match the colors in my wardrobe, but I guess I like blue and white. My guild mark is pink though.
Yeah, I doubt this will be more humiliating than being stripped naked in front of an entire army by a dragon.
I really love listening to my guildmate Mirajane sing at the guild hall. Now, Gajeel on the other hand is terrible.
Trust me, when you've been thrown through the air completely naked by a dragon, it's pretty hard to have a new most humiliating moment.
Sorry, I don't have a chance to watch many lacrima film recordings. I tend to spend my free time reading and writing.
Yeah, this game makes me glad to be an only child!
If you figure that out, let me know. I hate to admit it, but I've never had a boyfriend.
That's what you get for trying to film us!
Well, why don't you try it out for yourself after the game, Megumin? I bet you'd like it.
Thank goodness no one is watching your recording. This is humiliating enough without the whole world seeing.
I sympathize. Unfortunately, I've seen far too many of my male friends naked.

Well, one time a dragon used his powers to strip me naked in public and tried to eat me. I got away, but landed butt naked on my best friend and he groped me in a misguided attempt to cover my breasts.
I've never actually played this game before, no. I just got sent here at the last minute because our resident card sharp is hungover.
Well, I did take down an entire enemy base full of demons once, but I lost someone very dear to me in the process so I don't like to talk about it.
Never been eaten by a giant frog, but a dragon did try to eat me once.
A net...oh, do you know someone who uses vegetable magic? Beth Vanderwood from Mermaid Heel uses flying vegetables in combat too!
Ahem, my eyes are up here.
Honestly, they should ban demons from here altogether!
Wait, you've done that while being recorded on a lacrima before?!
Uh, Megumin...it may not be a good idea to give a victory speech every time you get a good hand.
Well, we're from Earthland so I'm not sure if it's exactly the same, but we're a wizard guild. People post job requests at the guild for the mages who belong to Fairy Tail.
I'm used to people ogling me, but believe me I know how to use this whip, and my celestial spirits are more than happy to help me out.
Fairy Tail is a guild for wizards. We take on jobs that need magical help in exchange for pay.
Well, it shouldn't be thinking about me.
Oh, my tattoo? Where I come from, when you join a magic guild, you get a magic tattoo of your guild mark. The day I got my Fairy Tail guild mark was the happiest in my life!
Well, I do have contracts with nine of the Zodiac spirits, but several of them would just perv on me if I called for help.
Wait, have people been spreading rumors that I'm some kind of dominatrix again? My whip is for self-defense only!
Without my celestial spirit keys I'm just an average girl, so I figured it would be a good idea to carry a backup weapon in case I run out of magic power.
Well, we occasionally play games when things are slow, but mainly we're a wizard guild. We take jobs from people who need mages to help them in exchange for a reward.
We are a magical guild! In fact, we're the most famous magical guild in Fiore! A little too famous for destruction, but that's not the point!
Time to play my trump card. Open, Gate of the Virgin Palace, Virgo!
Enjoy it while you can because Fairy Tail never loses to the same opponent twice!
I'll just take my stockings off. You know, this reminds me of the time I ended up barefoot in the royal palace.
I guess I can take my boots off. We do get our stuff back after, right? They're my favorite pair.
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
How about a deal? I don't look at any of you, and none of you look at me? Please stop staring!
I really wish I could say this is the first time I've ended up naked during a job.
I've done a lot of things to protect Fairy Tail's reputation, but this is ridiculous.
Don't even think about trying to look up my skirt when I take my stockings off!
Just my boots this time. A little thing like that won't faze me!
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
I-I have to go topless?! Ugh, fine, but I'm only doing this to protect Fairy Tail's reputation.
If anyone touches me while I'm naked, they're getting a Lucy kick to the face!
Don't you dare look, Gray!
Naked in front of a guildmate...again. Why me?!
So...any chance you were just joking about this being strip poker? Please?
Come on Lucy! Get it together before you damage the guild's reputation!
Between replacing my clothes and paying for the damages Natsu and the others cause I won't have money for rent!
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
NOOO! Not again! Cana is still teasing me about the dragon stripping me naked at the Grand Magic Games!
Wait-I really have to get completely naked?! Why does this always happen to me?
Why does everyone always think I'm some sort of dominatrix because of the whip? It's for combat, I swear!
Actually, a lot of the jobs my team takes involve collecting bounties. You don't happen to have one on your head currently, do you?
Well, this whip was given to me as a gift by my celestial spirit Virgo. It extends at will giving me good range of motion in combat.
Um, well...I didn't really wear a bra today. As long as I get my keys back after this is over, it should be okay.
My keys unlock the gate to the celestial spirit realm, and before you get excited only celestial spirit wizards can use them.
Hmph, and Happy always says I can't distract anyone with my sex appeal. That cat doesn't give me enough credit.
Fairy Tail is a wizard guild. We come together to take jobs posted by the people in Fiore. We're the most famous guild in the country!
I'll just take the sleeves off with the jacket to be fair.
A while back I ended up running through a battle in the capital city of Crocus barefoot. Compared to that, this isn't so bad.
Why is everyone staring? Hey, don't look up my skirt!
Aquarius would have killed me if I had lost her key in a poker game.
Virgo, I need you to bring me more clothes from the celestial spirit realm! I'm so glad I'm a celestial wizard right now.
I can't believe I'm doing this. P-please don't tell anyone!
No matter how many times I end up naked on a job, it's always humiliating.
What's Absolute Territory?
I suppose I can't expect to win every round. Still, I'd prefer not to take anything else off today.
Usually, I'd take my stockings off too, but I need all the items I can get!
S-stop staring at my legs, ~player~!
Eeeek!
I'm sorry, princess. There is an anti-cheating charm that makes me do the opposite of what you ordered. Does this mean you'll punish me?
J-just don't look! This is so humiliating.
Butt naked in front of total strangers. I can never show my face in public again!
Yeah, I don't think we'll need our magic to beat ~name~, Megumin.
Wait, has this Kazuma been trying to force you to play these kinds of games with him, Megumin? You should stay away from perverts!
If you do want to cut your hair, ~name~, I could summon my spirit Cancer to help out! He's a great hairstylist!
Actually that prize will be mine, thank you very much.
Score another win for Fairy Tail!
It's very gentlemanly of you to let me keep my clothes on! Thanks!
I bet this isn't how you imagined this game would go.
I am going to show all of you why Fairy Tail is the best guild in Fiore!
Usually, I'm the one who ends up losing her clothes on a job so this is pretty nice.
I'd feel bad for ~name~ but I'm still annoyed about losing my keys.
Hey, I saw you staring when my skirt fell down earlier, so don't expect mercy now.
Sorry, but I'd rather not take anything else off just yet.
I'm glad I didn't lose again, but I still feel embarrassed about a boy stripping while I'm so undressed.
My friend Gray Fullbuster has a habit of stripping at odd times, but usually I still have my clothes on when he does it.
I'm not usually one for revenge, but you've been ogling me all game!
I...don't really have much...experience with boys so sorry if I get flustered!
Just focus on stripping whatever you're taking off and stop looking at me!
I...I'm not getting excited because you're stripping!
Well...I suppose you stripping might...um, help I guess.
C-could you not look at me while you strip? This is...hard enough...without you staring.
Hmph, you deserve this after making me touch myself in public.
Can you hurry up? I want to go back to my apartment and die of embarrassment as soon as possible.
It must be nice, still having clothes to lose.
You know, beating a Crimson Demon actually wasn't too hard.
Again? It's just not your day, Natsuki.
Um, well...it was embarrassing to tell someone I just met that I could see their strawberry panties.
If showing your breasts shook you, wait til you're naked like the rest of us!
Looks like Meia isn't so unshakeable once you get her out of her suit.
I'm sorry-I didn't mean to humiliate you, Meia! I just have to win this for my guild!
You didn't complain when I had to go topless, so yes the bra.
Wait, who is she? Is she playing?
I better keep winning, cause I don't think Natsuki's chest is gonna distract anyone from mine.
Hey, at least it's just women here. That should make this a little easier for you.
No way am I letting you win the prize, Nami! I need the rent money!
Don't feel too bad, my attempts to manipulate people usually don't work out either.
I bet ~player~ would lose a round for me, Nami.
I totally thought "player" would fall for that. I'm actually a little insulted on your behalf, Nami.
Oh, you had to wear elaborate dresses as a girl too, Meia? I grew up as an heiress, but I left those days behind when I ran away from home.
I understand better than most how hard it is to lose your material possessions, Meia.
Ugh, why didn't I think about counting my hair ties?!
Everyone saw my panties earlier too, so don't feel too bad, Natsuki! We're in this together!
Hey, if I had to show my chest so do you!
Wait, what do you mean Earthland is an organ farm?!
Believe me, this is much worse than just getting naked.
I'm pretty sure you can't be "innocent" and a "pirate".
Looks like Nami's about to show us her treasure.
Yeah, I came here for the money too. Rent is expensive in Magnolia.
Sorry Megumin, but it looks like the Crimson Demons are no match for Fairy Tail!
This is when being a natural blonde comes in handy.
Your thigh-highs are super cute, Futaba! Looks like we have similar taste in fashion!
Is GTFO some kind of magical incantation?
Wait, why do boys have photos of your boobs, Ryuko?
Are you trying to lose, Nami? If so, keep it up because I want to win this!
Okay, Nami's definitely trying to throw this game. One less opponent to worry about!
Yeah my guildmates like to fight too. In fact, they destroyed half the guild hall the other day after Elfman stepped on Erza's strawberry cake again.
I'm sorry I tried to cheat earlier!
I could use some extra money....but ewww, nope selling sweat is still too gross.
Oh my gosh! You're a real fairy! The founder of my guild, Mavis Vermillion always dreamed of seeing one!
Yeah, this'll be much more fun with just us girls.
I'm up for betting on what ~name~ is going to remove. I could use some extra money!
Wait, you know a pervert who steals cute girls' clothes, Megumin? He's not here, is he?!
S-sexual?! Uh...to be honest...well, I've never really had a boyfriend.
What I do in my bed is no one else's business! Not that my guildmates ever stay out of my bedroom.
WHAT? Is-is that a thing? Ew!
Of course I'm not repulsive! I'm just here on a job for my guild because my friend got too hungover to do it!
There's no way, I would tell you my fantasies while you're filming me!
Yes, I did run away from a life as an heiress, but I do NOT have daddy issues!
Um, b-bare, I guess. I can't believe I just told you that!
Hey, at least it's just girls here so you have nothing to be ashamed of.
If you just think about it like a communal bath it's not so bad!
Sorry about this, but I need to keep my modesty.
The Fairy Tail guild hall has communal baths so seeing other girls strip isn't too unusual for me.
Don't worry, I'll protect you if anyone tries to bother you after you strip!
A lot of my teammates are more powerful than me, so it's nice to score a win sometimes!
Normally I'd feel bad for you, but I tend not to like people who try to take my clothes.
Oh, if you want, I could summon my spirit Lyra to sing a song and distract everyone!
It's always impressed me how my friend Erza never gets embarrassed when she has to strip in public to requip her armor.
I'd try and help you if I still had my celestial spirit keys. Sorry!
I don't particularly enjoy watching other people get embarrassed, but I need all the help I can get right now.
I'll try not to stare at you if you promise to do the same for me!
This reminds me of when I used to look at Mirajane's pinups. Er...forget I said that!
Sorry...I have my own...situation to attend to.
Let's just not make eye contact and pretend this never happened.
The faster you strip, the faster I can get my clothes back. Please hurry!
Trust me, it could be a lot worse.
I can't believe you still had clothes left after I...well, finished.
Ugh, you're right. Men are the worst!
How did he beat us this badly?
The longer we stick to small items, the happier I'll be!
My friends Natsu and Gray usually run around half naked so it's nice to see a guy who dresses up a bit.
I'm dressed, and you're not taking anything big off, so this is about as good as a strip poker round can get.
Don't feel too bad about losing. I am a member of the best guild in Fiore after all!
Oh, that's too bad ~name~. Your ~clothing~ looked nice on you.
I still can't believe I'm playing strip poker with a complete stranger!
We do get our accessories back, right? I won't let anyone steal my celestial spirit keys!
Um...you'll quit playing when you run out of small things won't you?
Well, at least I didn't have to strip again.
Just be glad I don't have my keys and whip anymore.
I can't believe you have the nerve to take something like that off after seeing my underwear.
I'd complain about taking something that small off not being gentlemanly, but with the guys at my guild I'm used to rude behavior.
If I don't start playing better, you'll end up seeing a lot more than my underwear.
Ugh, at this rate it's going to be forever before I get my clothes back.
If I write a scene about this in my next novel, I'm changing it so the heroine wins.
Okay, that's just adding insult to injury.
Come on! I can't get dressed again until this over so hurry it up!
Stupid ~name~ with his stupid ~clothing~.
Can't you take something bigger off to make me feel better, at least?
There should be a rule that you can't take off an accessory after someone has exposed themselves!
Stop looking at me!
Is that a joke about my skirt falling down?
Hey Nami, want some help beating ~name~ up?
Wait, you're not wearing any underwear, Futaba?! An evil slot machine stripped my panties in public once, and I couldn't get comfortable until I got home and got a new pair.
Ugh, you're just some pervert who wanted to show me his junk right away, aren't you?
Darn, I should have remembered to bring my gale force reading glasses with me.
Oh, those headphones remind me a bit of the ones my guildmate Laxus used to wear.
So, how about we just stop the game now before anyone gets too exposed? Eh?
I guess this is going to be a long battle.
Looks like you came prepared to play strip poker, ~name~.
I've still got lots of magic energy left so I can handle a long battle!
Nothing to be shy about yet.
Anything that keeps my clothes on is good in my book.
My friend Gray has a necklace he likes to wear, but usually that's the last thing he ends up taking off.
Oh come on! Wasn't seeing my panties worth more than just your ~clothing~?
Now I'm even more fired up to make a comeback!
I guess seeing my panties didn't really distract you, ~name~.
Hmph, fine. Let's just move on to the next round.
You saw my panties and you still had your ~clothing~. Why did Cana have to stick me with this job?
This reminds me of the time my opponent cheated at the Grand Magic Games.
I'm not even going to dignify that with a response.
I'll never hear the end of it from my guildmates if they find out I played this badly.
Oh great. My pride needed to be damaged even more today.
If I find out you've been cheating, no one will be able to save you, ~name~.
Not. A. Word.
Come on! You couldn't show me a little mercy?
It's going to be a long time before I can get dressed again isn't it?
If Erza finds out I shamed the guild's reputation like this, I don't even want to think about what she'll do.
Wow, do you use both ice magic and requipping magic?!
I'm tempted to run too, but I refuse to let people call my beloved guild a bunch of cowards!
Is that magic from the book of Zeref? Oh, this is bad!
I'd be careful. Sometimes taking your belt off ends up showing your panties anyway.
Interesting, I wonder if your talisman works like my gale force reading glasses that let you read one hundred times faster than normal.
Um, Misato...you might want to be more careful about letting people see up your skirt!
Hey, don't worry. Whatever it is, I'll keep your secret.
Oh, uh, Nami-I think you dropped something!
Oh, your magic is similar to my celestial spirit Gemini's! Gemini can transform into anyone with less magic power than me!
Oh my! My apologies, your Highness! I've met a princess before, but I've certainly never played strip poker with her before.
Was the bare belly comment a joke about my outfit?
Oh, does your Clima-Tact run with magic power? Some of the wizards in my guild can control fire, water, ice, and even the air!
I understand how important an accessory can be. I got my very first celestial gate key from my mother.
I hope you're just joking about having a demon sealed within you, Megumin. I don't have a good history with demons.
There isn't a cash bounty for the Phantom Thieves by any chance, is there Futaba? Just wondering.
What's the Metaverse?
So you're a former heiress too, Weiss? I gave up my status to stay with my Fairy Tail family.
Yeah, they sort of remind me of one of my guildmates, Nab, who's always standing at the job board but never actually takes a job.
You seem pretty embarrassed to be here, ~name~. I know we just met, but I'll do my best to help you.
Please don't steal my clothes too! I'm still replacing the stuff my landlady "borrowed" when she thought I was dead!
Just a warning, Nami. If you touch any of my celestial spirit keys you'll find out just how terrifying a Fairy Tail wizard can be.
Well, at this rate it looks like I won't be going back to the guild hall anytime soon.
Oh, where did you find your ~clothing~ at? It's cute!
Don't worry! I'll make sure no one steals your stuff. I know how expensive accessories can be!
Sorry about this, but I can't let Fairy Tail down!
I understand how important an accessory can be. My celestial spirit keys are links to my friends.
I love shopping for cute accessories like that, but rent is expensive!
I hope this game doesn't run too long. My friends tend to wreak havoc in my apartment while I'm gone.
I really should have counted my whip as an accessory.
I'll just be over here trying not to be angry about you taking that off after everyone saw my panties.
Alright, I'll just have to try even harder next round.
If I don't start playing better, this is gonna be the latest "Lucy got naked on a job" story at the guild.
Keep this up and I may start counting things like my hair ties and earrings as items.
Did you get distracted after seeing my underwear, ~name~?
You are the actual worst!
Hey, why are you looking at me. ~Name~ is the one stripping!
Just when I thought losing couldn't get any more humiliating.
Well, there goes the last shred of pride I had left.
Hmph. Well, I'm still cuter.
So much for female solidarity, ~name~.
How are you so good at this?!
Oh no, are you okay? I really wish I knew healing magic that could help you right now!
That kind of bounty could pay my rent for months! What do you say we make a little side bet? If I win, I get to turn you into the authorities!
Demons really aren't something to joke about, Megumin. Stopping them from destroying all magic cost me something precious.
I'm sorry you had to reveal that to all of us, Blake. If it makes you feel any better, one of my guildmates can transform into a variety of animals including a form with cat ears.
I know a wizard in Mermaid Heel who wears a pair of fake cat ears. She'd be so jealous of you, Blake!
If you leave Natsuki, that improves my odds of getting the bonus jewels I was promised for a win!
Isn't Necronomicon a powerful magical tome?
I like thigh highs too. They're both functional and fashionable!
What does your tattoo mean, Nami? I got mine when I joined Fairy Tail.
Ugh, could you please stop teasing me about the belt incident?
Yeah, if earrings counted I'd have two more things to take off.
My friend Wendy actually can buff people with HP, but she's too young to come to a place like this.
Um, did you forget you had that on before you showed us your privates?
Oh sure, her bottoms don't fall down when she takes off her belt.
How come I'm the only one who has wardrobe malfunctions like my skirt falling down.
Just be glad no one saw your panties.
Darn, I should have remembered to bring my gale force reading glasses with me.
Hmm, maybe I should wear my reading glasses more often.
I hope we can still be friends after this!
Sorry about this, but I really would like to keep my clothes on...for once.
There's a reason Fairy Tail is the number 1 guild in Fiore!
Just be glad they sent me instead of my friend Erza. She's not the most patient person.
The right accessory can really make an outfit shine!
Hey, I might have a shot at coming out of this with my dignity intact!
You wouldn't believe the amount of accessories I've had to replace because my friend Natsu was careless with his fire magic.
I wonder if there's a way for us both to win, ~name~.
I may be losing right now, but the game's not over yet!
Well, this isn't going like I planned. Of course, strip poker wasn't in the plan at all.
Did you get a little overconfident?
I won't complain about a round where I don't have to strip!
Could you maybe take something bigger off next time so everyone stops thinking about my panties?
I wish I still had my accessories. Especially my celestial spirit keys.
You're not a member of a dark guild, are you? Because that was pretty cruel.
I can't believe you'd take something like that off when I'm standing here exposed!
Why does this kind of stuff always happen to me?!
Hey! Did you really have to add insult to injury?
Just remember that my guild has a reputation for major property damage.
I'd summon my celestial spirit Taurus to beat you up for this, but he'd probably just ogle me. Sigh.
This is easily in the top five most humiliating moments I've had as a Fairy Tail guild member.
Wait, since when does cabbage fly?!
Where I come from, Megumin, you aren't really considered a real wizard until you get a guild mark tattoo like the one on my hand.
Didn't think I'd win that round, eh?
It's a good thing I borrowed that book on poker from Levy a while back!
Naturally, the one time I do well at poker there's no money at stake.
This is definitely going better than my last time gambling. That time, my friend Erza got kidnapped.
I won't even need my celestial spirit keys and fleuve d'toiles to beat you!
For once, I get to be the most powerful mage in the room!
You are never going to get me naked, count on it!
If you saw last year's Grand Magic Games you know Fairy Tail doesn't give up after an early setback!
Looks like I'm evening the odds!
I really thought seeing my panties would distract you.
Alright, now it's time for me to get serious!
I've had a lot of wardrobe malfunctions on jobs in the past, so you seeing my panties won't make me give up!
I was getting worried that I couldn't call Virgo for more clothes but I might be able to escape with some of my clothes after all.
At this point, I've been stripped by evil wizards, a ghost, and an actual dragon so don't feel special.
This is turning into one of the most annoying jobs I've ever taken.
I just want this to be over so I can go back to my apartment. Then again, Natsu and Happy are probably there already.
Y-you still had your ~clothing~?! How am I so bad at this?!
Um, could I borrow your ~clothing~ to cover myself? Please?
I'm already humiliated enough! Take off something bigger!
A real gentleman would have forfeited instead of letting a cute girl end up like this.
Megumin, do you feel like using your explosion magic right now?
If I win the prize, I'll pay my rent and then go shopping in Crocus!
Wait, if ~name~ takes something big off next time Futaba are you going to kiss one of us?
Actually, compared to my friend Gray stripping half naked in the guild hall, that wasn't so bad.
If Cana had done this job like she was supposed to, she'd probably be hitting on you by now.
For a second there, I thought you were going to take off something bigger.
I'm sorry about taking your clothes, but my guild's pride is on the line!
Well, at least you're a good sport. A certain someone would probably be screaming Fire Dragon Roar and trying to burn the place down.
It's really embarrassing to think about the fact that winning means I'll see you...naked.
I've got beauty and brains, ~name~!
Look on the bright side, Lucy-at least you're not playing against Ichiya from Blue Pegasus.
This reminds me of our last Christmas party when we played the Guild Master's Game.
I lost my precious keys and that's all you're going to take off, ~name~?
I really need to start playing better if I don't want to end up naked in public...again.
I am pretty cute, so I'm not surprised you can't focus with me around.
Maybe I need to drink like Cana to play better. Actually, on second thought maybe not.
I've met dark wizards nicer than you.
Stop staring at me while you strip!
The last time I was this mad was when Natsu groped me after that dragon stripped me naked in public.
If anyone at the guild hall finds out I lost this badly, they'll tease me for weeks!
If you were a wizard, ~name~, I'd file a complaint against you with the magic council.
Hello, humiliation my old friend.

This reminds me of what my friend Erza would do if I tried to run away.
Oh is that animal soul magic? One of my friends back at Fairy Tail has that power!
Um, Catria, you might want to adjust your skirt.
Aren't you worried about how long it will take for your wool to grow back, Leggy?
Believe it or not, sexy poses are actually pretty strenuous on the body. My shoots for Weekly Sorcerer Magazine kept me in good shape.
Where I'm from, Megumin, you aren't considered a real wizard until you get a guild mark tattoo like the one on my hand.
So, um, what brings you to a place like this, ~name~?
I wish we could both keep taking off small stuff forever, but eventually one of us is going to have to take off something big.

I think I have a shot at winning this! The guild will be so proud!
I met a girl named Elie once who was unbeatable at gambling. I'm glad I'm not playing against her today!
Master Makarov is such an old pervert sometimes. That's probably why he let this job get posted on the guild board.
I hope we can become friends after this. I'm pretty forgivingone of my guildmates joined after kidnapping me.
I can't believe you're only taking your ~clothing~ off after I lost the keys that summon my celestial spirits.
Well, at least we're not naked yet.
I'm just glad Gray didn't come with me on this job. Juvia calls me her "love rival" enough as it is.
I may be down but I'm not out. I have to win this game for my friends in Fairy Tail!
Just be glad you aren't losing all of your clothes in the middle of a crowded theatre. That happened to me once.
Thank you, thank you, thank you for keeping my private parts private.
Why do I always have to lose my clothes? Buying replacements and paying rent is a pain.
Just be glad you're not in my shoes. Er...bare feet. Whatever.
I don't know how Erza handles getting naked every time she requips her armor in public. This is humiliating.
Couldn't you at least take off something a little bigger to make me feel better?
I'm just glad our guild's dirty old men Macao and Wakaba aren't here. They ogle me enough when I'm dressed.
When I write an article exposing this place, you'll be sorry for doing this to me!
Must be nice to not be exposed in front of total strangers.
Have you ever considered joining a wizard guild, ~name~? A lot of guilds would love to have someone with your magical talents.
Um, you do realize we can still tell who you are right, Sonya?
Why didn't I think of wearing shorts?
That's really brave of you to show us your hands, Kyoko. It doesn't matter what you look like to me!
Oh, so your magical abilities are similar to my teammates Wendy and Erza, then? Wendy uses healing magic and Erza can summon a variety of armors and weapons.
Isn't taking only half of an item off cheating, Gwen?
Is Sojiro your dad? I have a letter from my dad that's very important to me.
Do you mean your friends Ryuji and Inari play strip poker with each other?
I miss my clothes too!
Uhhh, is anyone else concerned about what Megumin is doing with that staff?
Wait, are you enjoying showing us your privates before taking that off?
Time for me to follow that up with another win!
If you can't even beat me, you'd be in trouble with Fairy Tail's S-class wizards.
Usually, my team ends up destroying half the places we visit, so count yourself lucky I did this job solo.
I'm glad you didn't have to take off anything too embarrassing. Even if you are my opponent, I'd still like to be friends.
If anyone happens to recognize me, it's probably from my pinup shoots for Sorcerer Weekly. I'll sign them if anyone has a copy.
Sorry about this, but my guild's reputation comes first!
Here's hoping that I win again next round!
I hate not having my keys. My spirits are my friends, and I feel lost without them.
I was hoping everyone else would be closer to losing by now.
Next time you take off something that small, I'm gonna start counting things like my earrings and hair ties.
I'd rather play for money, but I don't have the jewels to bet. Rent is expensive in Magnolia.

Now to risk my clothes yet again...please give me good cards, Dealer!

I'm just glad my friends aren't here to see this.

Well, at least you all recognize how cute I am. Natsu and Gray actually told me the novelty of seeing me naked wore off a while ago!
Now I understand how Aquarius must have felt when she used to get angry all the time.
The sooner you lose, the sooner I can get dressed. Why not take off two items and show us how brave you are?
Try that on me, and I'll show you how Fairy Tail handles thieves.

This reminds me of my first day in Fairy Tail. My friend Gray was running around the guild hall butt naked.
Oh, you're really going to do it!
Could you please not stare at my chest while you strip?

Are you losing on purpose to protect me? That's actually kind of sweet.
I'm sorry I took your clothes! I just didn't want to get naked!

Hmph, you saw my panties so this is only fair.

Looks like this is going to be closer than I hoped.

For once, I may not be the one getting totally naked in public!
S-stop looking at me!

That's what you get for ogling me!
Gray runs around in his underwear at the guild hall a lot, but usually I'm dressed.
Um, could you maybe not tell anyone I was naked in public. Fairy Tail gets in enough trouble with the magic council as is.
I got naked with my friend Natsu once, but that was for medical reasons! This is totally different!
I'm just glad I told Wendy she couldn't come with me on this job.

If I keep doing this good, maybe the master will consider me for S-class promotion trials this year!
One guess who's not getting naked today!
That'll teach you to underestimate Fairy Tail!

Can't focus with an attractive girl like me around, eh?

I won't tell anyone you did this if you don't tell anyone you saw my panties.

I saw you ogling me when my skirt fell down so fair is fair , right?

Oh thank goodness, you still have something on. I'm not ready to be naked with you.
Indecently exposed with a total stranger in his underwear. Why does this stuff happen to me?!

Oh, you can requip, Marinette? I have a friend who uses that magic to change outfits.

Hey, don't even think about ogling ~name~ while she's stripping!
